results.name: Sum of divisors d of n for which 2*phi(d) > d.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} [2*phi(d) > d]*d, where [ ] are the Iverson brackets.
example: n = 105 has divisors [1, 3, 5, 7, 15, 21, 35, 105]. When A083254 is applied to them, all others except the last one result a positive number, thus a(105) = 1+3+5+7+15+21+35 = 87.
xref: Differs from A000593 for the first time at n=105, where a(105) = 87, while A000593(105) = 192.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 05 2018
